mapper.select: SELECT CALENDAR_NO, CALENDAR_TITLE AS TITLE, TO_CHAR(MAIN_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START1, TO_CHAR("MAIN_END", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END, CALENDAR_COLOR AS COLOR FROM STUDY_CALENDAR WHERE STUDY_NO = #{studyNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY_CALENDAR( CALENDAR_NO, CALENDAR_TITLE, "START", "END", STUDY_NO, MEMBER_NO, CALENDAR_COLOR ) values ( SEQ_STUDY_CALENDAR_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, TO_DATE(#{start1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{studyNo}, #{memberNo}, #{color} )
mapper.update: UPDATE MAIN_CALENDAR SET MAIN_CALENDAR_TITLE = #{title} , "MAIN_START" = TO_DATE(#{start1}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , "MAIN_END" = TO_DATE(#{end}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE MAIN_CALENDAR_NO = #{calendarNo}
